Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

 I heard that interview on the radio tuesday afternoon. Last night at my 
friday night game a girl ran across the field carrying the smaerican flag in 
the middle of a play. But everyone stopped eveen the players and refs to 
chant usa for a good 15 minutes. It was very heart warming and I thought it 
showed everyone is united on this one idea.

--part1_42.1a588744.28d4d472_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

<HTML><FONT FACE=arial,helvetica><FONT  COLOR="#000080" SIZE=2 FAMILY="SERIF" FACE="Georgia" LANG="0"><B> I heard that interview on the radio tuesday afternoon. Last night at my friday night game a girl ran across the field carrying the smaerican flag in the middle of a play. But everyone stopped eveen the players and refs to chant usa for a good 15 minutes. It was very heart warming and I thought it showed everyone is united on this one idea.</B></FONT></HTML>

--part1_42.1a588744.28d4d472_boundary--
